text: Nicanor Alejandro Serrano Aguilar (13 January 1933 – 6 August 2019) was an Ecuadorian politician and sports leader. He was born in Cuenca, Ecuador. Serrano was Vice President of Ecuador from 5 May 2005 to 15 January 2007. National Congress of Ecuador elected him to fill vacancy of Vicepresidency when Alfredo Palacio became President of Ecuador. Serrano has been a mayor, councilman, sports leader and civil engineer.http://www.ecuadorinmediato.com/Noticias/news_user_view/ecuadorinmediato_noticias --28381 Alejandro Serrano Serrano died on 6 August 2019 at a hospital in Cuenca from surgery-related problems, aged 86.Falleció el exvicepresidente Alejandro Serrano Aguilar ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Sports commentators Category:Ecuadorian sportspeople Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador Category:Civil engineers
title: Alejandro Serrano
